Name: Violet's Dream VR
About the game: Story 'Violet's Dream' (Chinese name '紫嫣的奇幻梦境') is a simulation to run cool and fly-based VR experience game, accompanied by real-time strong QTE system to enhance the player in the game scene empathy. HTC VIVE Operating The game needs to use the HTC VIVE device helmet with the handle. Players can shake the handle to simulate the game running. Players can respond to game events by pressing the trigger key. Players can lift the handle by simulating the slide down.
Meta Title: Violet's Dream VR: Mar 6, 2017, 华夏动漫 and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Violet's Dream VR? Check out the release date (Mar 6, 2017), developer insights from 华夏动漫, and a complete game summary.
